name: In the Shoes of a Politician
name_original: In the Shoes of a Politician
description: In the Skin of a Politician is a visual novel created for the Czech National Museum's exhibition Parliament!  Your task is to survive four years of elections as a newly elected MP. Morally grey elections, the search for the lesser evil and opportunism await you. The story is set in an alternative present inspired by the situation in interwar Czechoslovakia.
